Description.Text:
Position Very new building inaugurated in spring 2011. Located in central yet peaceful position in Ponchielli Street, close by the promenade of Viale Dante and 500 mt. from the promenade of Viale Ceccarini far away. Beach at only 80 mt.
More Informations Mandatory deposit € 100.00 (the deposit will be returned on departure after checking the apartment). Facolattivi costs: bed linen and towels richeista of Euro 15.00 per person. The customers can not find the laundry in the apartment, may decide to bring it from home or rent it on site. Kitchen linen not available. FACILITIES: lift, parking place. Nearby a variety of shops, bar, restaurants. We suggest this accommodation only to families. Compulsory deposit € 100.00
Check In Location:Relax Case Vacanze – Viale Dante 155, Riccione – Check in from 3:00 pm to 7:00 pm. Check out from 8:00 am to 10:00 am.
